info.name: News_Group_API
info.description:
Search through millions of articles from over 80,000 large and small news sources and blogs. This project includes : Spring Boot(2.7.4), Spring Data JPA, Spring Validation, Spring Security + JWT Token, PostgreSQL, Mapstruct, Lombok, Swagger

Contact Support:
 Name: Rajesh Engimoori
 Email: rajesh.em@gmail.com
